short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to easily pull up lyrics for any song through search using the Genius API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Users can simply open the extension and type in a song to retrieve the lyrics from Genius.com for a better music listening experience.
